verbose_text: In addition, overexpression of miR-181a inhibits C/EBP-alpha protein expression, suggesting that miR-181a is also an important regulator of transcriptional factor C/EBP-alpha in macrophage polarization.
evidence: miR-181a inhibits C/EBP-alpha protein expression              , suggesting that miR-181a is also an important regulator of transcriptional factor C/EBP-alpha
